tag_list: matt-guthmiller, igui-software, iguisoftware, cutting-edge-technology, anysimiphones, freeit4less, unlock, iphone, android, oil, software, cloud, ai, artificial-intelligence
overview:
Matt Guthmiller is a 17-year-old technology enthusiast, entrepreneur, software engineer, financial analyst, pilot, and the founder of AnySIMiPhones and iGUI Software.

Matt founded his first company, AnySIMiPhones, which sold both unlocked iPhones and the iPhoneSIMfree software with which to unlock them, in September 2007, at age 12. Less than two months later, in November 2007, Matt joined the FreeIt4Less team after selling AnySIMiPhones to FreeIt4Less, which went on to unlock nearly 10,000 iPhones around the globe.

After leaving FreeIt4Less in March 2008, Matt continued to be actively involved in the iPhone hacking community and also engaged in some blogging, as well as private web design/development consulting. He then began to pursue a new business venture in the form of a software development firm (presently known as iGUI Software) with the goal of revolutionizing human-computer interaction.

Most recently, Guthmiller used an AWS supercomputing cluster to develop a method by which to predict financial market behavior with extreme precision and accuracy.
